channel.title: font foundries on Konigi

item.title: 256TM
item.description: What could be more appropriate for a font foundry than to use its own large, capitalized type as the focus, form, and interface for the design. 25TM is modern, minimalist, and makes its statement firmly—type is the message, period. http://www.256tm.com/
